answers.answer: hi.i went to see a doctor yesterday, but he said if the vision is ok, there's nothing to b worried about.he checked the back of my eye with the light, and it seemed to b ok.i was just told to take paracetamol for the pain.it's much better today, but still feel it in my eye.thank you.

question: hi. i've got a stabbing pain in my right eye since 9 am today, can't close my eye or keep it open as it is really uncomfortable. i've got diabetes 1 type as well so I am little bit afraid if it is related to it. don't know whether to go and see my gp(little bit worried he will just say it's nothing to b worried about and wouldn't do anything to find out what could it b) and make sure everything is all right.
title: eye pain
